title: Please help me identify this font: From this book cover
content:
Hello,

I am hoping someone can help me identify this font used on the cover of John Fante's book The Road To Los Angeles

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015080346im_/http:/typophile.com/files/road-los-angeles-john-fante-paperback-cover-art_5024.jpg)

In case the attachment doesn't work here is a link to the cover: [http://3.bp.blogspot.com/\_x2TThMsyaYA/TRtu0KgpU9I/AAAAAAAAFq4/UBPcqmFL-Z...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015080346/http:/3.bp.blogspot.com/_x2TThMsyaYA/TRtu0KgpU9I/AAAAAAAAFq4/UBPcqmFL-Zo/s1600/road%2Bto%2Blos%2Bangeles.jpeg "http://3.bp.blogspot.com/\_x2TThMsyaYA/TRtu0KgpU9I/AAAAAAAAFq4/UBPcqmFL-Zo/s1600/road%2Bto%2Blos%2Bangeles.jpeg")

Thanks for your time and effort!
author: whatisthisfont
